definition: cast and crew/performers and production team
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: Also tell what guide dont have to worry about the cast, he will do his best.
sentences.chinese: 亦名告訴何導不用操心劇組的事，他會盡力而爲。

sentences.english: A 24-hour photo shoot was held to photograph and film the kittens for use on these plates.
sentences.chinese: 劇組光拍攝這些用在盤子上的貓咪就花了24個小時。

sentences.english: The cast and crew of Cranford finally wrap.
sentences.chinese: 克蘭福德劇組終於殺青了。

sentences.english: " The alien was produced as a slip-on mask, and nicknamed "Goggle-Eyes" by the crew.
sentences.chinese: 這個外星人的道具是套頭面具，劇組戲稱“水泡眼”。

sentences.english: Did you have the same crew on all three films?
sentences.chinese: 這三部片子所用的劇組人員有換過嗎？

sentences.english: I hear that you and the cast go out to lesbian bars and clubs in LA quite often.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說你和劇組成員在洛杉磯的時候經常去女同酒吧。

sentences.english: But in the cast, devoted to the work of the son, and often neglect Chen.
sentences.chinese: 但在劇組裏，欣兒專心於工作，經常會疏忽陳超。

sentences.english: Because he was always in character, "it gives anenergy to the crew.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他總是很入戲，“這給整個劇組帶來了能量。

sentences.english: J: It’s been amazing. It’s been a long time coming, you know, from the time I got involved until now, it’s been three years.
sentences.chinese: 從我進劇組到現在已經三年了，真是一段很長的時間。

sentences.english: Half our crew, over 100 people, left.
sentences.chinese: 劇組的一半工作人員，超過100個人都離開了。

sentences.english: In one and the same tunnel, a lot of different scenes are shot.
sentences.chinese: 在同樣的一節隧道中，劇組將拍攝大量不同的鏡頭。

sentences.english: 'The Revenant' was the product of the tireless efforts of an unbelievable cast and crew.
sentences.chinese: 《荒野獵人》是劇組不懈努力完成的一部作品。

sentences.english: What was it like entering an already well-established cast as an outsider?
sentences.chinese: 作爲局外人，然後進入一個成熟的劇組是什麼樣的？

sentences.english: Constant tell you before, the company did not pursue the responsibility of the cast.
sentences.chinese: 張之恆告訴大家，公司並未追究劇組的責任。

definition: to put on a play/to perform/fig. to pretend/to feign

script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
to begin shooting (a movie, a scene of a movie etc)/to start the bidding (auction)/to start a trading session (stock market)
